alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Grimes, southwestern Montgomery, northeastern Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Todd Mission to 6 miles northeast of Waller to near Pine Island. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tomball, Prairie View, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Hockley, Waller, Magnolia, Pine Island, Stagecoach and Todd Mission. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
